_header: He that time borroweth from morrow to morn
_description: On using time — one quatrain (abab) in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
He þat time borwith fro morwe to morwen& ȝelth with
                    þe mouthHe sal han ned to borwen to day or to morwenA word of his
                    mouth
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 24.
